frontmatter.title: Neighborly
frontmatter.description: Customizable Social Simulation Framework for making Talk of the Town-likes

frontmatter.title: Centrifuge
frontmatter.description: Node-based visual scripting tool for story sifting

frontmatter.title: Creating a City Builder using Python
frontmatter.description: Record of lessons learned and design decisions during my journey developing my first city builder game. Follow along as I learn how to architect a city builder, use PyGame, and make the whole thing run a social simulation

frontmatter.title: Cool Packages & Potential Projects
frontmatter.description: Collection of project ideas I want to try as well as packages that I want to play around with.

frontmatter.title: Paper Reading Blog
frontmatter.description: My thoughts on research papers that I've read.

frontmatter.title: Magpie
frontmatter.description: Desktop game where the player is a Magpie bird stealing from a museum guarded by dogs. This game was the final group project for Computer Game Programming Fall 2018 at Carnegie Mellon University.

frontmatter.title: Raid AI
frontmatter.description: This was a brief startup project created on the side while working. The goal was to train agents using reinforcement learning to be better companions for RPG-style raid battles.

frontmatter.title: Infiniforge
frontmatter.description: 3D Sword Mesh procedural generator written in TypeScript.

frontmatter.title: ML-Agent Boxing
frontmatter.description: I threw this project together over the course of a week as an entry in Unity's first challenge for their new 'Ml-Agents' machine learning workflow.

frontmatter.title: Auditory Brain-Computer Interface for VR
frontmatter.description: My masters research on developing an auditory brain-computer interface for interacting with objects in virtual reality.
